name: Base Jumping
description:
Hello!

In my childhood i loved the Flash Game "Base Jumping", so i decided to clone it :) Its easy to controll, press a key to JUMP OR OPEN the parachute. 

In Singleplayer mode u must complete three league(One League are three rounds). The last battle is against the "King" :)

In Multiplayer u can play against one other.

At the moment there are no Sounds

Only tested on my computer, so idk if it works :& 

Hope you like it:)
